title: Client-Based Language Instructional Design Practice

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental language education theories and understanding of elementary education environments
context.additional_context: A process for current elementary language education practitioners to gain instructional design experience reflecting actual client needs through VR simulations at vocational training institutions

learning_goals: Learners can develop instructional design documents based on client needs analysis that may occur in actual elementary language education settings
Learners can test design proposals using VR simulations, incorporate feedback, and derive optimal instructional strategies
Learners can evaluate the integration level of client objectives and learner objectives, and quantitatively/qualitatively analyze the value of the design process

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
